title: Python web frameworks
content: Does anyone know a good Python web framework for interactive apps that had a good  set of widgets and is also easy to code?

comments.body: Streamlit for the easiest coding but less flexibility. You look into flask or django if u require increased flexibility.
Adding on, **Django** is by far the most popular. Documentation is excellent, which will help you get up and running.
Flask gives you more flexibility compared to Django
yeah yeah. Both are popular tbh
Flask is best for someone inexperienced, It gives a clear picture of web development.
